title: Jimi Hendrix - Axis Bold As Love, 2010 Sony 180 Gram Vinyl, 24-b
description:
Jimi Hendrix - Axis Bold As Love, 2010 Sony 180 Gram Vinyl, 24-bit 192khz

2010 Sony Legacy reissue
180 gram pressing

pressed at RTI

B4 - One Rainy Wish
B5 - Little Miss Lover
B6 - Bold As Love
